testcase.name: Verify Create Teacher Functionality
testcase.system-out: When User clicks on Teachers module.........................................passed And User clicks on Add Teacher..............................................passed And User enters "Dwight" in first name......................................passed And User enters "Schrute" in last name......................................passed And User enters "dwightschrute@dundermifflin.com" in email..................passed And User enters "01/01/2000" in joining date................................passed And User enters "6789" in password..........................................passed And User enters "Business" in subject.......................................passed And User enters "8475555678" in mobile number...............................passed And User selects "Male" in gender...........................................passed And User selects "English" in department....................................passed And User enters "08/15/1980" in birth date..................................passed And User enters "100000" in salary..........................................passed And User selects "12" in batch..............................................passed And User enters "Paper" in section..........................................passed And User enters "Scranton, PA" in permanent address.........................passed And User clicks on Submit button............................................passed Then User should be able to see created teacher displayed in the UI.........passed And Tester should be able to verify created teacher in the Database.........passed
